column3: Closing. A better solution would be to add a JSON-WSP (serve over http) and allow clients to parse the method/arguments structure. The argument-types/syntax could be additional infos in the CRPCTable (or similar).\n

Nit: Any particular reason for this?

You can just keep the `std::string`, so it is move-only:

``` diff
diff --git a/src/rpc/client.cpp b/src/rpc/client.cpp
index 9d4e788..553c21b 100644
--- a/src/rpc/client.cpp
+++ b/src/rpc/client.cpp
@@ -23,3 +23,3 @@ using namespace std;

-static const struct RPCConvertParam vRPCConvertParams[] =
+static const CRPCConvertParam vRPCConvertParams[]
